thread.title: VIDEO: Evra's hilarious impressions of his Juventus team-mates
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Evra's hilarious impressions of his Juventus team-mates

title: VIDEO: Evra's hilarious impressions of his Juventus team-mates
text:
0 Jan 2, 2017 15:40:19 Juan Cuadrado and Mario Mandzukic are mocked by the mischievous Frenchman as he takes a light-hearted look at their character traits EXTRA TIME 
Patrice Evra has become something of a social media sensation, with a legion of followers often treated to memorable videos from the Juventus full-back. 
In recent months, the Frenchman has indulged in a spot of karaoke, dancing and ironing! 
Evra agent responds to PL rumours 
He has now turned his hand to impressions, with his current team-mates getting the Evra treatment. 
Picking up on unfortunate character traits, the former Manchester United defender decides to focus his attention on Juan Cuadrado and Mario Mandzukic. A video posted by Patrice Evra (@patrice.evra) on Jan 1, 2017 at 5:14am PST 
Cuadrado will be relieved to discover that mocking his dancing is the worst Evra could muster. 
Mandzukic, in contrast, will be less than impressed with the treatment he gets â€“ although it appears that the Croatian striker is never happy anyway! Related
